description:
Stop buying things you need at high retail prices!

Start saving $1000's a month buying premium quality items on Craigslist.

I know Craigslist can be daunting for a lot of people.  Especially if you haven't spent a lot of time buying on Craigslist.

In this course I'm going to show you exactly how to shop on Craigslist, find the best deals and be safe.

I'll then teach you how to become a master Craigslist negotiator and get phenomenal deals on the things you need.

Ultimately by the end of this course, you'll be able to look up high quality items on Craigslist and buy them at huge discounts.

You'll learn the principles of marketplace negotiation and you'll be able to apply them beyond just Craigslist.  This course will teach you how to negotiate.

I'm excited to show you what I've prepared and I look forward to seeing you on inside!
title: Craigslist Negotiation: How to Save 70% Off Like New Items
